name: Reckless Racin'
description:
Submission for the GMTK 2019 gamejam with the theme "Only One". 

In this game you drive a car which you have four actions, but each action only be used once.  The game has 8 levels, the last level i've yet been able to beat. Good luck!

Buttons used: WASD or arrow keys, R to restart current level and Esc to go back to the menu or exit the game. Also i'd recomend running the game in exclusivly in 1920x1080 resolution. I am unexperienced with UI making in Unity and noticed that it looks very odd in other resolutions.

Music: www.bensound.com (Cute, Summer & Ukulele)
